properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Murrells Inlet to South Santee River SC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 3 at 5:47PM EST until January 4 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, dense fog will reduce
visibility to less than one mile. For the Small Craft Advisory,
southwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 4
to 6 feet expected. For the Gale Watch, northwest winds 20 to 30
kt with gusts up to 40 kt and seas 4 to 7 feet possible.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Murrells Inlet to South Santee
River SC out 20 nm.

* WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 7 AM EST Saturday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 9 PM EST Saturday. For the
Gale Watch, from Saturday evening through Sunday morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility. Low visibility
will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EST SATURDAY... ...GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING
